commit message:
NEWS: Remove OpenGL entry in 1.5.0 news section.

(cherry picked from commit ccd1553f60680daf49f9237b718e9013cc3c3f97)
CONFIGURE: Disable OpenGL by default.
DEVTOOLS: Disable OpenGL support in create_project.
I18N: Update Swedish translation from patch #3541394
I18N: Update Spanish translation from patch #3541399
I18N: Regenerate translations data file
SCI: Update comments in kGetAngleWorker()

TINSEL: Fix bug #3541230 - 'DW: PSX version locks up after using the book'

Removed the superfluous MIDI offset storing code. Now, the MIDI buffer is
re-read when the music loops. This removes a static variable and also
fixes another bug in the SEQ decoder.
I18N: Update Hungarian translation from patch #3541507

I18N: Update Italian translation

This was sent by Matteo by email.
I18N: Regenerate translations data file
NEWS: Mention Maemo port changes
MAEMO: Update debian/changelog
TSAGE: Fix for bug #3541354 - Nico shooting player after being tied up
TINSEL: Added MD5 detection entries for Discworld 1 Polish translation
Updated da_DA file
I18N: Update Czech translation and README from patch #3541613
I18N: Update French translation
I18N: Regenerate translations data file
TINSEL: Cleanup

SCI: Properly detect the Polish version of KQ5

Thanks to jacek909 for the extra MD5 checksums of the Polish version.
This fixes bugs #2725722 (Polish version checksums) and #3536863
(SCI: KQ5 Floppy English detected as Polish)

MAEMO: Fix compile without keymapper
(cherry picked from commit aa8dec9a722e1b85374a215cba9a7066040a5e6e)

MAEMO: Set defaults for fullscreen and aspect ratio correction

New installs now have fullscreen and aspect ratio correction on by default
(cherry picked from commit 6abb3501b50101760885efaf4a9721beadb18052)

MAEMO: Minor whitespace fix
(cherry picked from commit 848b6daeb980199a948fd5d067e5f199c1ee1593)
I18N: Updated German GUI translation.

DOCS: Updated German README (Liesmich) and NEWS (Neues).
Liesmich now based on README SHA1 ID: 604c6bde91a9f1fb71d18f8fdcc172fc738ff9ef
Neues now based on NEWS SHA1 ID: 3de8c4b07d6f15fe6e9ca4bcb8da92532ebf5692
I18N: Update French translation
I18N: Regenerate translations data file
TINSEL: Fix bug #3459999 - 'TINSEL: DW Crash in Subtitle Menu'

CINE: Mark Operation Stealth as Unstable.

Since the cine engine's support for Operation Stealth is still
incomplete with significant GFX glitches, this should be marked
as 'ADGF_UNSTABLE' to warn users and prevent invalid bug reports.
However, it should be noted that the game is completable.
TSAGE: Altered the ADGF_TESTING flags for Blue Force
DREAMWEB: Marked Dreamweb as stable
DISTS/FEDORA: Add new dependencies

MAEMO: Add new build dependencies

Since libfaad doesn't exist in maemo.org extras-devel, it cannot be added.
TSAGE: Changed '0' to 'ADGF_NO_FLAGS' in detection tables

ANDROID: Target SDK 10, and support more device configurations.

Identical to 1.4's fe2b85befacc05f448bc828c021d96deab9ea2ed.

ANDROID: Disable the savegame parachute

Only on the stable branch, since this is unfinished and might wipe
savegames of the user.
(cherry picked from commit cf41ac0fec13c1191fd107bf25505713aa60afde)
NEWS: Set 1.5.0 release date
DISTS: update version information
RELEASE: This is 1.5.0
DISTS: Generated Code::Blocks and MSVC project files
CREDITS: Credits for original sources
DREAMWEB: Remove asm sources/translator
CREDITS: Update dreamweb team
